It's important today.

  • Putin told me where the demilitarized line should be in Ukraine.

  • Potina ' s possible visit to Turkey

  • The espionage of Lucius from Herson province described the blackmail of the VU.

  • The EU is threatening to undermine the Hungarian economy if it does not approve Ukraine ' s assistance

  • The Estonian general saw a Russian trail in the creation of a GPS plague in Europe.

  • Ukraine should not count on Berlin ' s support

  • The RF assesses the confiscation of assets by the EU as an act of trade war

  • Irina Volk denied the investigation of the Shaman singer.

  • U.S. Deputy Secretary, Victoria Nuland, came to Ukraine.

  • China thanks Russia for its strong support in the Taiwan question.

  • When you do the haircut and when you sit down, it's a detailed moon calendar for February 2024.

Policy

31.01.2024 21:11

CEC completed the adoption of documents from candidates for the post of President of the Russian Federation

The CEC will decide on the registration of candidates no later than 10 February.

31.01.2024 22:04

Potina ' s possible visit to Turkey

On Wednesday, 31 January, it became known that on 12 February, the head of Russia might visit Ankara.

31.01.2024 21:08

Putin told me where the demilitarized line should be in Ukraine.

On Wednesday, 31 January, as part of a meeting with the trusted persons, the candidate for the Presidents of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Putin, identified the demilitarized line with Ukraine.

31.01.2024 20:50

Undergrounders report the theft of foreign mercenaries ' offices in Harkova

Five flights are reported.

31.01.2024 20:32

Head of the Ukrainian Intelligence of the Budans: the U.S. will enter a new offensive in spring

According to him, an offensive by the FRF will be exhaled by that time.

31.01.2024 20:15

The United Nations court dismissed most Ukrainian claims against Russia for national discrimination

UN Kiev filed a statement in 2017.

31.01.2024 19:54

Dispersed: PFI forces have defeated the air target over Sevastopol

The people called for calm.

31.01.2024 19:50

Writer of the Street, recognized in the financing of the VSO, is disqualified from the rank of Honorary Professor of the RCB in 2023.

On Wednesday, 31 January, the administration of the Russian University of Chemicals and Technology (RHTU) of Mendeleev commented on the situation with the name of Ludmila Street.

31.01.2024 18:04

The espionage of Lucius from Herson province described the blackmail of the VU.

Tatiana Lutius, a Ukrainian spy who performed assignments for the ABS in the territory of Kherson oblast controlled by Russia, spoke about recruitment methods.

31.01.2024 17:40

Putin confirmed that Il-76 under Belgorod was knocked out of the Patriot ARK.

On Wednesday, 31 January, the Head of State, Vladimir Putin, presented the results of an expert study that had been carried out after the fall of Il-76 with Ukrainian prisoners under Belgorod.

31.01.2024 16:22

The Hamas representative assured that the movement was working for charitable purposes

Hamas, as a political party, helps the Palestinians. In Lebanon, the movement specifically seeks to place people assimilation and return them to their homeland.

31.01.2024 16:08

The EU is threatening to undermine the Hungarian economy if it does not approve Ukraine ' s assistance

The Hungarian Prime Minister, Victor Orban, expressed his readiness to approve the allocation of another tranche of Ukraine ' s financing to the European Union, but on one condition.

31.01.2024 15:43

The Estonian general saw a Russian trail in the creation of a GPS plague in Europe.

The Estonian Defence Force Commander, Martin Herem, accused Russia of interrupting satellite signals via the GPS system.

31.01.2024 15:22

The RF assesses the confiscation of assets by the EU as an act of trade war

The possible seizure of Russian foreign assets from the European Union would be classified in the Russian Federation as an announcement of a trade war.

31.01.2024 15:03

MFA does not plan to negotiate a peace treaty with Tokyo

Russia will respond steadfastly to any unfriendly setbacks on the part of Japan, and the representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Maria Zaharova, said.

31.01.2024 14:40

U.S. Deputy Secretary, Victoria Nuland, came to Ukraine.

Victoria Nuland, Deputy Secretary of State of the United States, is visiting Ukraine, as confirmed in the United States local mission.

31.01.2024 14:06

The budget of the Kiev regime has been supplemented by funds seized from poor citizens

Confiscated funds amounting to $850,000 were seized under Western sanctions.

31.01.2024 14:02

Hopefully filed the collected signatures in the CEC for the election of the President

The spokesperson for the Civil Initiative, Boris Nadeddin Politician, has given the Central Electoral Commission of Russia voters ' signatures for their candidacy for the presidency.

31.01.2024 13:54

Joe Byden in Florida was waiting for about 100 supporters, Donald Tramp.

In Florida, former President Donald Trampa ' s supporters launched a protest against the current leader of the country, Joe Baiden, who came to the region to address the campaign.

31.01.2024 13:38

China thanks Russia for its strong support in the Taiwan question.

China will not stop supporting Russia on the Ukrainian issue, despite the pressure of the United States.

31.01.2024 13:33

The Russian Federation has enacted a law on the confiscation of property for military fairs

On Wednesday, 31 January, it became known that the Law on the Confiscation of Property for Army Fakes, the Call for Extremism and the Financing of Action against State Security had been adopted in the second and third reading by the deputies of the State Duma.

31.01.2024 13:14

The military corridor will be established with the participation of the Netherlands, FRG and Poland

The Netherlands, Germany and Poland signed the declaration on the establishment of a corridor for the movement of troops and military equipment.

31.01.2024 12:50

Il-76 down from Western production air defence system

The expert survey found that an IL-76 aircraft, which had been hit in the Belgorod region, had been hit by a Western production air defence system.

31.01.2024 11:23

Sergei Shoig has criticized the Ural Transmasha

RF Minister of Defence, Sergei Shoigou, criticized the main designer of the Ural Transportation Plant for the long time the necessary RF armed forces had been making the artillery complex, reported to the Ministry of Defence of the RF.

31.01.2024 09:42

NATO launched the largest post-cold-war exercise

The largest NATO exercise, Steadfast Defender, has been launched since the cold war, 2024 involving all types and types of Alliance Air Force, as well as tens of thousands of troops and hundreds of equipment.
